DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Participant Case or Control Status Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity._The assemblage of traits or outward appearance of an individual. It is the product of interactions between genes and between genes and the environment.:A condition or state at a particular time._An indication of a subject's status as a case or a control for a given study._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

It is the product of interactions between genes and between genes and the environment.:A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Participant Case or Control Status Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An indication of a subject's status as a case or a control for a given study._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant is a true case for the phenotype under consideration.

Concepts.definition: The participant is a true case for the phenotype under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant is a true control for the phenotype under consideration.

Concepts.definition: The participant is a true control for the phenotype under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant is neither a true case or true control for the phenotype under consideration.

Concepts.definition: The participant is neither a true case or true control for the phenotype under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant is a probable case for the phenotype under consideration.

Concepts.definition: The participant is a probable case for the phenotype under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant is a probable control for the phenotype under consideration.

Concepts.definition: The participant is a probable control for the phenotype under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unable to Assess Case or Control Status
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The participant's case/control status could not be assessed.

Concepts.longName: Unable to Assess Case or Control Status
Concepts.definition: The participant's case/control status could not be assessed.
